setup: test -n "$CONDUCTOR_ROOT_PATH" || { echo 'Error: CONDUCTOR_ROOT_PATH is not set'; exit 1; } && mkdir -p database && [ -e .env ] || ln -s "$CONDUCTOR_ROOT_PATH/.env" .env && [ -e auth.json ] || ln -s "$CONDUCTOR_ROOT_PATH/auth.json" auth.json && [ -e database/database.sqlite ] || cp "$CONDUCTOR_ROOT_PATH/database/database.sqlite" database/database.sqlite && composer install --no-interaction && npm install && npm run build
